law.text: Upon application to the department and payment of all applicable fees, the department shall license by endorsement an applicant who is registered, licensed, or certified in another state if the requirements for registration, licensing, or certification in the issuing state are substantially equal to the requirements for licensing in the Commonwealth of Kentucky and the applicant is in good standing in the issuing state. The department shall license an applicant by endorsement only if the issuing state extends similar reciprocity to Kentucky citizens licensed under KRS 227A.010 to 227A.140.
law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 434, effective July 15, 2010. -- Created 2003 Ky. Acts ch. 119, sec. 7, effective June 24, 2003.
